website_summaries.verdict: Choose these sandals if your top priority is watching your budget but need a basic, pretty pair that can be worn with a wide variety of clothing styles.
pros: A must-have for both dressy and casual occasions, as they sport a traditional style that compliments numerous fashions
cons: Not real leather, but this may not concern you
Some owners gripe about them fitting tightly around the toes and being uncomfortable at first

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a sleek, minimalist, good quality sandal, these are for you! I was worried that they'd be too narrow for my wide feet, but the sandals fit perfectly. Genuine leather & speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: kay p

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed: Not a true Steve Madden sandals
customer_reviews.text: I am a lover of Steve Madden sandals, I think I may own over 15 pairs or more of Steven Madden sandals because they are genuine leather. Unfortunately, this pair of Donddi sandals is not leather. Why? Because I have the tan leather Donddi I purchased from SteveMadden.com. This Donddi's upper is like plastic, its bad, and I'm really disappointed. I wore them to work once (03/22/17) and I called Amazon that same night and told them how poor a quality this pair of sandals is and I am returning it because its not a true Steve Madden.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly V.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not for big ankles.
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 11 in shoes, I ordered a 10 and a 11. The 11 was a bit too big, the 10 fit but the ankle strap was too tight. So girls with bigger ankles beware it may be tight on you, you can always punch another hole but I am sending back just because they squeezed my ankle too much. The were very pretty and good quality though!
customer_reviews.author: RDIL

customer_reviews.title: Writing review 3 years after buying them!
customer_reviews.text: I can no say it enough! These are my favorites sandals ever!. I was afraid that they were going to be hard on the bottom, because, this was the first time buying shoes online. but not, they are super comfy. They are just perfect. I have used them for more than 2 years. I bought this for my 30th birthday and they have been so good. I will surely come back when mine break, but since they are so good, I don't know when will this happen. I 100% recommend them. I wear them with pants and skirts and dresses and they look good with everything. Thank you so much for making such a great sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V.

customer_reviews.title: love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cute sandals for the second time. My other ones were worn out after 3 years of wear and tear. I bought the first pair from Steve Madden online and decided to buy them on amazon this time for faster shipping. They felt tight at first but after spraying them down with water and stretching them out with my feet they started to loosen up a bit. Now that they are dried they fit perfectly. Just be careful not to pull too hard all at once! Hope this helps for those with wide feet like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Osuna

customer_reviews.title: Double check your size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice. However, the fit was on the larger side. I wear a 6.5. Finally figured out why. They came in a 6.5 box with a 6.5 sticker placed on the bottoms but they are 8.5. Very disappointed with the sizing. Now it's too late to return :( Double check your shoes!
customer_reviews.author: priscilla watson

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals. They are a classic and simple design and seem very well made. They are comfy enough to wear all day, right out of the box. I usually wear an 8.5, but in some shoes wear an 8 and on rare occasions I wear a 9. I ordered the 8.5 and they fit just right, but when I walk I notice that a couple of my toes extend slightly beyond the sole. I do have kinda long toes thought and it doesn't seem like sizing up would be worth it since the shoe feels really good and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: jilixi

customer_reviews.title: Original shoes, different than before
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are original. Brown sandals are made with genuine leather (see photo attached). However, If you previously owned same shoes same brand, you will be disappointed: -quality of leather and finishing is lower: after unpacking and one try looks tremendous as for first try, not even walking ; -color is darker; - rubber sole is very slippery - shoes are are a bit smaller than previous version same size My previous Donddi leather lasted for 4 years, and they didn’t fall apart. I bought a new pair on a sale for $30. If I have paid $55, I would be a 100% disappointed. Rather than that, stylish, goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kombucha

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the tan and black versions are leather, the “100% man made” description in the details is inaccurate. Secondly I’m super annoyed that these dropped $5 a pair cheaper than they were when I bought them two days ago. Third, these are better than I could have hoped for and I’m thrilled with them. I was worried the straps would be stiff but they’re butter soft. True to size and comfortable straight away. If you need arch support these are not for you. But given that I can’t wear shoes with arch support these are perfect for me. Love the simplicity and sleek look. Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and classic
customer_reviews.text: These are really great shoes! I love them, cute, fit very well, true to size and the greatest thing is that you can truly wear these sandals all day long. I only wear sandals, and I can tell you some are really cute, but after 6 hours your feet hurt, I can guarantee you that you can wear Steve Madden Donddi's for 18 hours with no problems, cause I have done it many times. I have them in 3 colors and use them a lot. If you ask me, the white ones look the best!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable sandals, i can walk hours in them, they are simple but beautiful, I received compliments for them. The only reason I take off one star is somewhat flimsy strap which i try to handle carefully not to tear apart as the quality of the leather isn’t great. And the full price is too high for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap poor material
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I wanted to live these, made very cheap. Buckle is plastic and the shiny rose gold straps are all plastic, flimsy. The sole it very flimsy plastic... just disappointed. The straps feel like they are just going to snap every step you take. I usually wear 7.5 or 8, I ordered an 8 and the buckle strap was tight on the last whole, usually I have a little room to leave buckled and slip on an off. Not happening with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, so perfect for a day out. One thing, The Brown ones are way softer than the black leather ones. I actually ended up returning the black pair as not only were they not as comfortable, they also stained my feet black.
customer_reviews.author: katie igartua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandal
customer_reviews.text: I already own a pair I bought in a department store. This is the genuine article. I wear a 7.5 and ordered a 7.5. I have wider feet so the band across the top of my foot is a little snug, but I also know after a few times wearing it stretches just a tiny bit and the leather becomes softer, so they are so comfy you can wear them all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Doxiemom

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow for a Medium
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Steve Madden sandals from the store and was in need of an all black pair. I turned to amazon and was happy to find these but very disappointed when they arrived. I ordered the size I always do and these fit way different. They were too narrow, not comfortable, and not attractive on. The strap across the toes was too tight and made my foot look scrunched up. Honestly, these were either Steve Madden reject sandals or they weren’t really Steve Maddens.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: No way this is not a knock off
customer_reviews.text: I love Steve Madden shoes and this pair definitely does not live up to the quality that is normal with Steve Madden products. The tag in the shoe is cut and stitched in such a way that it picks at my heel. The overall appearance of the shoe is so much less than what I am used to with this company. This shoe feels like it should be purchased in a street market and definitely does not feel like it is worth the $47.99 that is being charged for them.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaE

customer_reviews.title: Real
customer_reviews.text: I had these in black that i bought from Belk. I loved them so much i came to amazon to look for them and they are 20$ cheaper on here. And they are real steve madden sandals just like the black ones i have. My feet easily get blisters and these are the first sandals to not do that to my feet. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered theses shoes on the 2nd of July and wore them only 3 times before they ripped. I wear an 8.5 and these shoes fit like an 8, they're a little too small. I simply was walking in a parking lot when I looked down and my shoe had ripped. It was only my 4th time wearing the shoes. I am very disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: What isn't to love?? These sandals have such a clean simple line that they are perfect with anything, dressy to casual. Great look. For those who absolutely HAVE to get a shoe with an arch support, these wouldn't be for you.....however, they were never intended or designed for long walking treks or standing on your feet for hours. The style and design are just exactly what I want to go to dinner, a movie, out with the gals, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: For the almost $50 I spent on these sandals, I expected a product of decent quality. These are more like something you would pick up at the dollar store. The leather is thin and cheap. One strap was shorter than the other. The alignment of the sewing was odd on the left shoe. I questioned whether this could be a knock-off pair of shoes. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Good sandal but the tan leather color was not as pictured. My dog got to my "perfect brown" sandals and I searched high and low to find a replacement pair. I finally thought I found another perfect brown sandal here and spent good money for them. After much anticipation, when they arrived I was very disappointed with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kolter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered these sandals
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered these sandals. I am a size 6 or sometimes a 6.5. I ordered the 6.5 and the fit is perfect. They are a very nice looking sandal and well made and I could wear them with anything. I choose "no arch support" because the sandal is flat and I don't have trouble with arch support and in my opinion sandals don't offer much arch support anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I usually size up with sandals because I hate when I take a step my feet slide and touch the pavement. These are true to size. I didnt have to size up with this. There was room for my foot to slide when I took a step, without hitting the ground. They're made ever so well and super comfortable. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this sandal
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this sandal, although I wish the buckle color had been an option, as I really, really prefer silver and this is gold. I may pay to have it swapped. And the foot bed is VERY flat. There isn't any support at all, but I don't do much walking in them, since they're for work. The fit is perfect and the quality of the leather is good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Not for pudgy feet
customer_reviews.text: These look cute on everyone else, but they aren't for me. I have fat feet, not particularly wide, the width was fine, but pudgy and I didn't think they looked good. Is there such thing as a foot muffin top? That. Also, they just kinda remind me of little kid sandals.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are not the quality I expected, they ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are not the quality I expected, they seem rather cheap. The sole is all wavy and the holes for the buckle are not piercing through, so if you want to change the hole you need to punch it yourself all the way through. I am size 11 and ordered the 10 as some reviews said the large sizes run big, which is true, they fit well (maybe a tiny little bit shorter than I would have liked).
customer_reviews.author: Sid Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great for walking
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! Steve Madden is always a guarantee which is why I have been a loyal customer for the past 15 years! I recently bought these sandals for my honeymoon in the Riviera Maya. Didn't even bother to break them in before hand. I can honestly say they are very COMFORTABLE! I walked around everywhere and although they have no arch support, my feet didn't hurt at all. No blisters either. Highly recommend! Will continue to be a loyal customer of Steve Madden.
customer_reviews.author: Vania

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em but thank God for super glue!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I LOVE these and they go with everything- but on my first day in Disney with the fam, the ankle strap came right out! I only brought these sandals so I super glued it back in and they were great. All day in Disney for a week and they felt wonderful...and the the last day the foot bed became unattached from the sole! Too late to return but after only one week they fell apart TWICE! And I'm sad because I do really, really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Stellmacher

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these shoes. I love them so much. My first pair broke after about a year of having them. But in all fairness, I think I wore them every day. So they were very loved. When they first arrive, the leather is very stiff. Don't let that scare you, after about week of wearing them, the leather becomes soft and malleable. These sandals look great with everything from jeans to dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I find sandals with the strap on the front part of the shoe, I buy them, because I have wide feet with a incipient bunion :( So, this kind of shoe conceals it. These sandals are true to to size, the material is soft. I think that they are a little little little wide, because it fits bit loose and with my wide foot feature, I think these might not work on people with very narrow feet. I am planning to buy them in other colors. :)
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made-Do Not Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals to replace the exact same pair that I lost while on vacation. When these sandals arrived I was grossly disappointed. I purchased my original pair from Nordstrom and they were one of the best pairs of sandals I have ever owned, comfortable and very well made. This replacement pair that I ordered on Amazon paled in comparison. They are made of VERY cheap leather and are not comfortable at all. Save your money and do not purchase these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great sandal but it’s not
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals last summer in brown and fell in love. They fit perfect and were great everyday sandals for summer. Decided a month later to buy them in black..same size, but they didn’t fit. Returned and tried again this summer. These were an okay length, unlike the first set, but too tight. Like way too tight. Not anything like the brown pair I got. Returned and found them at Macy’s and fit perfectly. This seller must only sell messed up versions of the sandals. Steer clear and just spend the extra $10 for a good set from another store.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maresco

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sandal. Though I did return because I got it with my prime box. It is just a basic black sandal. I was not willing to pay the price for something I could find at Walmart for 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: and the bed of this shoe fits perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wide foot I’d suggest upping a half size! I usually wear an 8 and got an 8.5 because my foot is on the SLIGHT wide side, and the bed of this shoe fits perfect. However, I’m not sure these will work for me as the strap is pretty short. I have it on the last hole and it still fits a little tight. :(
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!!!!. Two different construction, one the strapes was glued, the other sowed. The one glued is a cheaper looking material than one sowed, the bottom rub down faster and the leather is thinner. Why didn't i return?. Didn't noticed the differences until my second time wearing them. The straps were unbuckled, and i srep on the glued one, it almost pulls out. Sometimes of Amozon retailers or knockoff........Amozon needs to take better care of its customers. We buy them, they will get the bad name.
customer_reviews.author: Tashoya Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: also need a good breaking in since the leather gave me blisters on ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised about the size since I have another pair of Steve Madden flats that were the same size and a little big on my foot. I have short toes and these are a bit snug, also need a good breaking in since the leather gave me blisters on the heel and from the strap above toes the first time I wore them. I bent those parts around a bit befor the next time and they were much better. They're such a cute shoe
customer_reviews.author: MCPamler

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the look
customer_reviews.text: Sandal looked just as it did in the ad. Very satisfied with the look, feel of the leather and the color. After reading many of the reviews decided to go up one size as that seemed to be what was most suggested. Having gone up one size, which is perfect, except that left a gap between my toes and the front strap. Corrected that by attaching a thick piece of mold skin to the underside of the strap...worked perfectly. Would recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Found my perfect sandal - confirmed authentic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a simple well made sandal. And this is it! I can wear it with maxi dresses, jeans, wide leg pants etc. love that the strap goes across the toes and not in between them. There’s none of that awful toe cleavage lol. Can’t think of anything bad to say. Will buy again in more colors. Also since a lot people are saying it’s fake. I emailed Steve Madden’s customer service with this Amazon link. They confirmed it is authentic. So I don’t know what other people are talking about!
customer_reviews.author: lo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: The most versatile style shoe in my opinion. Wouldn’t recommend walking too much since it’s flat but it’s adorable and fits true to size. I wear them with shorts, rompers, jeans, anything really.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy buckle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 since I am usually a 6.5 Wide, these accommodated to my feet and are a great fashion sandal. The buckle is a little flimsy and caused me to not be able to find the right hole. I’ve now resorted to slipping them on buckled and bringing the strap over my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: ....BUT I noticed that the skin on top of my foot where the ankle strap goes across started getting rough and calloused. Hasn’t stopped me from wearing them though!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!! Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: These are fake!!! Broke within 2 months!! I have my actual Steve Maddens I got from Nordstrom’s that I’ve had for 2 years!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Masterson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple sandals that look good with a lot of outfits. These have been a cute addition to my work wardrobe. Fit as expected, comfortable, and so far sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Luna92

customer_reviews.title: Cute but horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are SO cute, and I really loved them. I always got compliments on them as well. However, I could only wear them for not even 2 months. The shoes ripped when the strap meets the sole. Aesthetically you cannot tell, but when I walk, it hurts the arch of my foot. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mikauli

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty trim ankels but...
customer_reviews.text: I have to put the buckle on the first notch although I have trim ankles. I like the look of them but they either run a wee bit snug or my feet have inched forward a half size. No matter, they are keepers
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but needed to be broken in
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and very trendy! They fit well but I have wide feet so at first they we're a tiny bit uncomfortable on my toes, however after wearing them they stretched to a comfortable shape because they are leather. I am used to breaking shoes in, and I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Sent me two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I got two different sizes!!!!! I ordered 7.5 and I got 1 7.5 shoe and 1 6. The whole point of ordering online during a pandemic is not going to stores, including to return items. I feel like I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fake Steve Maddens
customer_reviews.text: This item is not actual Steve Madden. I shopped these sandals at our local department store but purchased on Amazon because I needed a large size and fast shipping. The sandals I received were not leather. The band that rests over the toes has a jagged edge. The sole is warped and without any cushion or stitching, unlike the real shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: My go-to summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! They have been my go-to summer sandal all season and have held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for a week, and the sole on the bottom of the shoe started to show the plastic box foundation. I didn't wear these shoes all day either, just to the grocery store and back, or for a date night. They fit nicely and look cute, but they are not worth $50. You're just paying for the name, I'm pretty sure Walmart has the same shoes for half the price and same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work! They are cute and simple! When summer rolls around I will order another pair in a different color!! Go well with dress pants for a business/ causal setting!
customer_reviews.author: AprilBama

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair in tan a couple of years ago and love them, so this year I bought them in black. They are super comfy from day one and I believe they'll last forever.
customer_reviews.author: voilaboheme

customer_reviews.title: They require blood sacrifice
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable, they may have been after i wore them for a while, but they definitely would have cause blisters. I could feel the front strap digging into my foot.
customer_reviews.author: llamaluver

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - fakes?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old pair which I loved. Definitely not the same quality as the ones I bought directly from Steve Madden. I’m thinking these are a knock off. The cognac/leather color is a lot more dull than my previous pair and overall quality is just lacking. Buying shoes on Amazon is tricky. I’ll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product and service
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals. They're just what I wanted. Simple and stylish, black leather can go casual or a little dressy. I've had Steve Madden shoes, and so was pretty confident they would be keepers.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, breezy sandal.
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I was looking for. Wanted a sandal without a piece of leather in between the toes. Nice leather uppers. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jean King

customer_reviews.title: Shoe broke 3rd day wearing
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke (pulled out of the sole) yesterday. I've worn them 3 times, but since it's over 30 days since they were delivered, I can't return them! So that sucks. Wish I hadn't wasted $50 on shoes that lasted for three days.
customer_reviews.author: Kelseyruth89

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they fit perfect, are comfortable...no blisters or sore feet, only one complaint and that is that they leather squeaks when you walk. the leather strap that is tucked into the soles of the shoes seem to rub and make a squeak. I can't hear it when I am out around town, it's just noticeable to me when I'm in a quiet location. Still love them, and will continue to wear.
customer_reviews.author: kermie

customer_reviews.title: SNUG TOE STRAP
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe. Good quality and nice looking. There wasn't enough space between the sole and toe strap for my foot so I had to return. Possibly could have stretched it, but didn't want to take the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great if your toes are long, like mine. True size fit. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but wrong size delivered
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are super cute and easy to walk in. The only thing that bothers me is that I ordered a women's size 8, but the sandals that came are size 9.5's. Luckily I can still walk in them without too much difficulty, but I wonder why they didn't check the size of the shoes. It's frustrating because I read other reviews about people having the same thing problem, but I decided to take the gamble anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Reina N.

customer_reviews.title: Steve Madden? I doubt it
customer_reviews.text: Are these shoes supposed to be leather? NOT! They were too big and did not seem to be leather to me. I doubt if they were even real Steve Madden.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zani

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected and look great! They are leather and look good with casual clothes or a dress. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: but after a few times wearing them they are so great! I love the simplistic look and quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: Little uncomfortable at first and I was afraid I got a size too small, but after a few times wearing them they are so great! I love the simplistic look and quality of these shoes! They quickly became my classic go-to shoe for this summer. Even though they are definitely more expensive compared to other sandals you could find with a similar look, I have always loved Steve Madden shoes so I could not say no.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them. They are very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They are very cute. But you can’t put them on or take them off with completely unbuckling. Not an ideal shoe for slipping in and off. But they look great and I wear them to town a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes last year in black and they have held up wonderfully, I bought them again this year in brown and after 2 times of wearing them the thick strap started coming undone on the sides. I haven’t worn them for any extenuous activities that should have caused this, very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and super comfortable. I was worried the leather might be a bit rigid at the front and dig into my foot since I've had this happen in the past, but not the case. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Searight

customer_reviews.title: Tighter on one foot
customer_reviews.text: These were a tad bit small and more so on my right foot than the left. It rubbed a blister on my right pinky toe after less than an hour of wear. I really like them so I'm trying to stretch the leather in hopes that they eventually feel better to wear. To the seller's defense, my feet are a little wide so I probably should have sized up a half size. They are truly adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sandals!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were stiff when I first put them on, but after the leather warmed up to my skin, they became soft and super-comfortable. The left shoe seemed slightly tighter than the right one but that resolved after a couple of wears, and they've become my most favorite pair of footwear. I wear them every day, and will continue to do so until the weather turns cold in the fall. They are casual but just dressy enough that I can wear them with shorts or date night dresses. I have been searching for the perfect black sandals and I think these are it!
customer_reviews.author: AKReader

customer_reviews.title: These are super exactly what i've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are super exactly what i've been looking for. I am normally between an 8.5 and 9 and the 8.5 was perfect. I wouldn't say they are the most comfortable shoes on the planet, as they don't really have any arch support, but they are pretty good! The color is just like in the picture, too.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoe but this company has a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe but this company has a problem with sizes. They consistently label my shoe as a 10 Medium and then deliver a 10. I own a 10 Medium and it fits perfectly. These are simply too narrow. I sent the first couple of pairs back because of the wrong listing. I am done with them.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: these are great! I have another pair of steve madden sandals ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great! I have another pair of steve madden sandals that are similar but different color straps. I thought they would be pretty much the same, but these straps are a little more stiff. Still look great and fit well though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sandals are very nice and they fit okay
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are very nice and they fit okay. There's just no padding on the sole at all so I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzieq249

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sandals for everyday wear. Leather stretches and makes it comfortable the more you wear.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: They were cute while they lasted...
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely no stretch in the heel part so they are a pain to get on and off. I was trying to slip it around my heel, as I've always done with sandals, and it broke after only 3 wears. I ended up ordering some identical off-brand sandals that are more comfortable and stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amj0151

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and well made. I love them. They’re my new go to summer sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Deserae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flat shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect flat leather shoe - just what I needed- I did not want any arch support - just a simple Sandle love it
customer_reviews.author: R~

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather for timeless design sandals
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather for timeless design sandals. I am usually a 9.5 in shoes and it fits perfectly (all my toes stay on the foot bed and my little toes are entirely covered by the band). No arch support as other reviewers said but fine for my feet. I hope they last me years and that the leather will aged beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Cyris J.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, not a walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, look super cute with some shorts. Zero arch support. Not a great shoe for walking around all day.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These were super cute, but they weren't wide enough for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute, but they weren't wide enough for my feet. I hate when my feet hang off the sides. I have pretty wide feet, so if you have narrow feet or even normal feet, these would work for you.
customer_reviews.author: roxykargisize

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Even those the sandals have no arch support or anything they are literally the most comfortable pair of sandals that I own. I got these for a festival and wore them for the first time with 0 foot pain and no blisters. The strap across the top of your toes is very comfortable and it never felt like it was rubbing me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndle

customer_reviews.title: The leather had a plastic-y feeling. I am normally ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather had a plastic-y feeling. I am normally an 8.5 in Steve Madden shows, but the sandals were a bit too small. Size up a half size. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this shoe but the thing is that if you don't have skinny feet, this shoe would hurt. I have skinny to chubby ish feet depending on the weather and let me tell you. The first day I wore it out, it was ok but as I wore it a little longer, the front straps started to cut my feet. I don't advise to wear this when it is extremely hot. You're feet will swell up and plus this is leather, it will be uncomfortable to walk long distance. Good for those who has skinny no meat feet. I'll give it another go. Hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love shoe for comfort and quaity
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for comfort and quality - Wear with anything and it's cute on my foot for work and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Lissie

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love.
customer_reviews.text: I got them today and wore them to work. I wear a 9.5 in open-toed shoes and the fit is perfect. I'm in love with these sandals and HIGHLY recommend them. Also, if you're flat footed like me, it's worth the uncomfortableness which I have yet to experience.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, fast shipping, great quality, great color, good buckle, will wear these as my nice black sandals whenever I go out. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like them but I don't think they are worth $50
customer_reviews.text: I like them but I don't think they are worth $50. If you have a wide foot, then order a half size up. Leather is thin. They will do until I can find another pair locally that I like in the brown color.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with these sandals. Can wear them to dress up an outfit or as casual.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Skeeter Staples

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They fit as expected and the color is true to the picture. They're very comfortable and are perfect for spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are a bit big and the tags broke off of the sole of them on the second wear. Other than that they are fine. They were the color I expected and go with a lot of outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! The size runs normal, they're comfortable, and they are adorable! These are great for summer and spring, or if you live in Florida like I do, pretty much year-round. They're more than I wanted to spend on a pair of sandals ($45) but they're real leather and they seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandal. Same as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Show ran a little smaller than expected but I'm not disappointed at all. It's a pretty shoe. Just like it's pictured. The leather straps are comfortable and soft so no blisters or need to break in really. I'd purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: applemon28

customer_reviews.title: Been searching for these!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect brown leather sandal for quite a few months now. I finally found them!! These fit perfect and I am so excited for this snow to go away so I can show them off!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: True to Size!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect!! Very true to size. I bought the tan ones, and they are a bit darker than I had expected. They are darker than the pictures but not by too much. Overall, super cute sandals and they fit perfectly (I usually wear 6.5, but tend to size up to 7 in sandals because you don't want your toes hanging out, and I took a chance and went with 6.5 and they are just right size wise!)
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Metzker

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted basic black sandles but they felt like wearing rigid slabs on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. They were hard and did not bend. I knew just putting them on that the hard leather straps would rub and be uncomfortable. It's a shame, I just wanted basic black sandles but they felt like wearing rigid slabs on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wide foot then these sandals are for you. I going to buy them in every color. I have very wide feet and it is so hard to find shoes/sandals that fit, that are CUTE!! I read the other reviews before I bought these and figured I would give them a try. LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: 44CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: but they are not soft and comfy like they look in the picture and as you'd expect ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute sandals, but they are not soft and comfy like they look in the picture and as you'd expect them to be. As others have said, the "leather" is stiff and rubs against my feet. If you're mostly sitting that is fine, but any amount of walking around and they hurt some. Not quite what I expected, but they are decent.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and made of great quality material
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to sandals for everyday wear now. They are comfortable and made of great quality material. I was a bit nervous to order sandals online, but they fit perfectly. I'm a size 9 and I ordered a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size 6.5. It fit perfectly. I like that the entire sandal is all black, it’s easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my mom because she doesn't get online and she likes them
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gould

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Donddi Sandal
product_meta.description:
Looking’ for your perfect “classic little sandal” for the upcoming season donddi is it! her design is simple with a wide strap across vamp and adjustable ankle strap. try a muscle tee and faded denim skirt with these babies.

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
